results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እኛ እንደዚሁ በጎ አድራጊዎችን ሁሉ እንመነዳለን፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በዕልን ትገዛላችሁን? ከሰዓሊዎቹ ሁሉ ይበልጥ በጣም አሳማሪ የሆነውንም አምላክ ትተዋላችሁን?
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
